mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lcc_bookreview(book_idx,user_id, reg_date, review_content, rating) VALUES(#{book_idx}, #{user_id}, now() ,#{review_content},#{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT review_idx,book_idx,user_id, reg_date, review_content, rating FROM lcc_bookreview WHERE book_idx = #{book_idx} ORDER BY review_idx ASC
select review_idx,book_idx,user_id, reg_date, review_content, rating from lcc_bookreview order by reg_date desc limit #{page_skip_count}, #{page_size}
